TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SessionIDManager extends System.Object implements class System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDManager

summary.span: 管理 ASP.NET 会话状态的唯一标识符。

span.span: Manages unique identifiers for ASP.NET session state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个 HTTP 模块，管理用于 ASP.NET 会话状态的唯一会话标识符。The class is an HTTP module that manages unique session identifiers for use with ASP.NET session state. ASP.NET 会话的唯一标识符是属性，可以从访问属性与当前或。The unique identifier for an ASP.NET session is the property, which can be accessed from the property of the current or . ASP.NET 会话标识符是随机生成的编号，编码为 24 个字符字符串从小写字符组成到 z 和 0 到 5 的数字。The ASP.NET session identifier is a randomly generated number encoded into a 24-character string consisting of lowercase characters from a to z and numbers from 0 to 5. 默认情况下，值发送包含 ASP.NET 应用程序的每个请求的 cookie 中。By default, the value is sent in a cookie with each request to the ASP.NET application. 包含的 cookie 的名称值默认情况下是 ASP.NET_SessionId。The name of the cookie that contains the value is ASP.NET_SessionId by default. 您可以通过设置配置不同的 cookie 名称`cookieName`的属性[sessionState 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d)到所需的 cookie 名称。You can configure a different cookie name by setting the `cookieName` attribute of the [sessionState Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d) to the desired cookie name. 如果你想要禁用使用 ASP.NET 应用程序中的 cookie 并仍进行的会话状态使用，您可以配置你的应用程序通过设置 URL 而不是一个 cookie 中存储的会话标识符`cookieless`属性的`sessionState`元素`true`你的应用程序的 Web.config 文件中。If you want to disable the use of cookies in your ASP.NET application and still make use of session state, you can configure your application to store the session identifier in the URL instead of a cookie by setting the `cookieless` attribute of the `sessionState` element to `true` in the Web.config file for your application. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property.

para.span: 可以使用你自己的自定义会话标识符替换 ASP.NET 会话标识符，通过创建继承的类重写和具有自己的自定义实现的方法。

span.span: You can replace the ASP.NET session identifier with your own custom session identifier by creating a class that inherits the class and overriding the and methods with your own custom implementations.

para.span: 有关重写的示例类并实现这些方法，请参见为提供的示例方法。

span.span: For an example of overriding the class and implementing these methods, see the example provided for the method.

para.span: 您可以替换整个通过创建实现的类的自定义的会话 ID 管理器与接口。

span.span: You can replace the entire with a custom session-ID manager by creating a class that implements the interface.

para.span: 如果自定义的会话 ID 管理器支持无 cookie 会话标识符，您需要实现用于发送和检索 URL，如 ISAPI 筛选器中的会话标识符的解决方案。

span.span: If your custom session-ID manager supports cookieless session identifiers, you will need to implement a solution for sending and retrieving session identifiers in the URL, such as an ISAPI filter.

para.span: 有关创建自定义的会话 ID 管理器的详细信息，请参阅。

span.span: For more information about creating a custom session-ID manager, see .
ASP.NET Session State Overview

related.span: HTTP 处理程序和 HTTP 模块概述

span.span: HTTP Handlers and HTTP Modules Overview

span.span: Creates an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不是应用程序代码中调用。This constructor is not intended to be called from application code. ASP.NET 将调用此构造函数可创建的实例类。ASP.NET calls this constructor to create an instance of the class. 后调用的构造函数，ASP.NET 将调用方法来初始化新对象。After calling the constructor, ASP.NET calls the method to initialize the new object.

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

summary.span: 创建会话的唯一会话标识符。

span.span: Creates a unique session identifier for the session.
A unique session identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不是应用程序代码中调用。This method is not intended to be called from application code. 方法返回的是随机生成的编号，编码为 24 个字符字符串从小写字符组成的唯一会话标识符到 z 和 0 到 5 的数字。The method returns a unique session identifier that is a randomly generated number encoded into a 24-character string consisting of lowercase characters from a to z and numbers from 0 to 5. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了继承的类类，并重写并方法，提供并验证方法作为。The following code example shows a class that inherits the class and overrides the and methods with methods that supply and validate a as the . [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/CS/GuidSessionIDModule.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/VB/GuidSessionIDModule.vb#7)] 若要使用此示例中演示的自定义类，可配置的 sessionIDManagerType 属性[sessionState 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d)元素，如下面的示例中所示。To use the custom class demonstrated in this example, configure the sessionIDManagerType attribute of the [sessionState Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d) element, as shown in the following example. ``` ```

para.span: 你可以提供要创建继承的类的 ASP.NET 会话状态由自定义会话标识符重写和具有自己的自定义实现的方法。

span.span: You can supply a custom session identifier to be used by ASP.NET session state by creating a class that inherits the class and overriding the and methods with your own custom implementations.

para.span: 如果你的自定义会话 ID 不满足强制执行的默认实现的字符约束方法，应重写方法以提供自定义会话标识符的验证。

span.span: If your custom session ID does not meet the character constraints enforced by the default implementation of the method, you should override the method to provide validation of your custom session identifier.

para.span: 在这种情况下，类可确保你的自定义会话标识符是 URL 的 HTTP 响应中编码和解码从 HTTP 请求使用的 URL和方法，分别。

span.span: In this case, the class will ensure that your custom session identifier is URL encoded in the HTTP response and URL decoded from the HTTP request using the and methods, respectively.
ASP.NET Session State Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不是应用程序代码中调用。This method is not intended to be called from application code. 此方法在内部使用类进行解码自定义创建的类继承的值类并重写和方法。This method is used internally by the class to decode custom values created by classes that inherit the class and override the and methods. 若要确保自定义的会话标识符值的保真度检索来自 HTTP 请求通过方法，解码的自定义值使用方法。To ensure the fidelity of a custom session-identifier value retrieved from the HTTP request by the method, the decodes the custom value using the method.

span.span: to redirect to determine cookie support; otherwise, to suppress automatic redirection to determine cookie support.

span.span: When this method returns, contains a Boolean that indicates whether the object supports issuing new session IDs when the original ID is out of date.

returns.span: 指示 对象已进行重定向以确定 Cookie 支持；否则为 。

span.span: to indicate the object has done a redirect to determine cookie support; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当`cookieless`的属性`sessionState`元素设置为`AutoDetect`，则对象将重定向到相同的路径以确定连接的浏览器是否支持 cookie。When the `cookieless` attribute of the `sessionState` element is set to `AutoDetect`, the object will redirect to the same path to determine whether the connecting browser supports cookies. 如果`suppressAutoDetectRedirect`参数是`false`，则服务器将执行这种重定向。If the `suppressAutoDetectRedirect` parameter is `false`, the server will not perform this redirection. `supportSessionIDReissue`将返回参数`false`如果请求使用 cookie 的会话标识。The `supportSessionIDReissue` parameter will be returned `false` if the request is using cookies for session identification.

summary.span: 将新创建的会话标识符保存到 HTTP 响应。

span.span: Saves a newly created session identifier to the HTTP response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不是应用程序代码中调用。This method is not intended to be called from application code. 调用方法期间对象事件。The method is called by the object during the event. 方法会将 URL （当使用无 cookie 会话状态） 中或在不过期的会话 cookie 中存储的会话标识符。The method stores the session identifier in either the URL (when cookieless session state is used) or in a non-expiring session cookie. 默认情况下放置一个不过期的会话 cookie 的唯一会话标识符并设置`cookieAdded`参数`true`。By default, the places a unique session identifier into a non-expiring session cookie and sets the `cookieAdded` parameter to `true`. 无 cookie 会话状态对象插入到当前 URL 的唯一会话标识符，将浏览器重定向到新的 URL，包括会话标识符，然后设置`redirected`参数`true`。For a cookieless session state, the object inserts a unique session identifier into the current URL, redirects the browser to the new URL that includes the session identifier, and then sets the `redirected` parameter to `true`.

span.span: The response has already been sent.
-or-

exception.span: 传递给此方法的会话 ID 验证失败。

span.span: The session ID passed to this method failed validation.
ASP.NET Session State Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public static int SessionIDMaxLength { get; }
.property int32 SessionIDMaxLength
Public Shared ReadOnly Property SessionIDMaxLength As Integer
public: static property int SessionIDMaxLength { int get(); };
member this.SessionIDMaxLength : int

summary.span: 获取有效会话标识符的最大长度。

span.span: Gets the maximum length of a valid session identifier.

value.span: 有效会话标识符的最大长度。

span.span: The maximum length of a valid session identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 会话标识符的最大长度为 80 个字符。The maximum length of a session identifier is 80 characters. 而创建的会话标识符方法为 24 个字符长，允许的会话标识符的最大长度类为 80 个字符。While session identifiers created by the method are 24 characters long, the maximum length of a session identifier allowed by the class is 80 characters. 这一点尤其重要，如果实现一个自定义。This is especially important if you implement a custom . 方法，检索从当前会话标识符值，可确保值不能超过值和会话标识符是一个包含仅小写字符的 24 个字符字符串到 z 和数字 0 到 5 通过调用方法。The method, which retrieves session-identifier values from the current , ensures that values do not exceed the value and that the session identifier is a 24-character string containing only the lowercase characters a to z and the numbers 0 to 5 by calling the method. 如果实现一个自定义继承的类类，并重写方法，但不是方法，你的自定义的会话标识符值必须满足更高版本的约束。If you implement a custom class that inherits the class and overrides the method but not the method, your custom session-identifier values must meet the constraints above. 有关重写的示例类并实现这些方法，请参见为提供的示例方法。For an example of overriding the class and implementing these methods, see the example provided for the method.

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不是应用程序代码中调用。This method is not intended to be called from application code. 方法验证所提供`id`是 24 个字符的字符串从小写字符组成到 z 和数字 0 到 5 并且的最大长度的会话 ID 不超过 80 个字符。The method verifies that the supplied `id` is a 24-character string consisting of lowercase characters from a to z and numbers from 0 to 5 and that the maximum length of the session ID does not exceed 80 characters. 方法调用方法时检索从 HTTP 请求，以确保提供的会话标识符的格式正确的会话标识符。The method calls the method when retrieving a session identifier from an HTTP request, to ensure that the supplied session identifier is properly formatted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了继承的类类，并重写并方法，提供并验证方法作为。The following code example shows a class that inherits the class and overrides the and methods with methods that supply and validate a as the . [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/CS/GuidSessionIDModule.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/VB/GuidSessionIDModule.vb#7)] 若要使用此示例中演示的自定义类，将为`SessionID`Web.config 文件中具有自定义类，如下面的示例中所示的 HTTP 模块。To use the custom class demonstrated in this example, replace the `SessionID` HTTP module in your Web.config file with your custom class, as shown in the following example. ``` ```

para.span: 你可以提供要创建继承的类的 ASP.NET 会话状态由自定义会话标识符重写和与自定义实现的方法。

span.span: You can supply a custom session identifier to be used by ASP.NET session state by creating a class that inherits the class and overriding the and methods with your own custom implementation.

para.span: 甚至当你创建的自定义会话标识符，会话 ID 是限制为 80 个字符由类。

span.span: Even when you create a custom session identifier, the session ID is limited to 80 characters by the class.
ASP.NET Session State Overview
